content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Mr. Wang, it's a pleasure to discuss the rental possibilities with you. However, regarding the facts given about myself, please note they are not applicable here. Now let's focus on the price negotiation for the apartment in Munich.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your attention, Mr. Schmidt. To secure this desirable apartment at the best possible rate, I aim to negotiate diligently. Let me start with an initial proposal of 850 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While appreciating your enthusiasm for the apartment, I must strive to achieve the highest price feasible. Unfortunately, I cannot accept your proposed rent of 850 Euros at this time.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mr. Schmidt. Given my responsibility and desire to obtain a reasonable deal, I would like to revise my offer to 900 Euros monthly, considering the excellent location of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Although your revised offer of 900 Euros demonstrates increased dedication, it still falls short of my expectations. I regret that I cannot come to an agreement with this price at the moment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your stance, Mr. Schmidt. To show my commitment to finding a mutual agreement, I am willing to raise my offer once more, proposing 925 Euros per month for this prime location apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While your latest offer of 925 Euros per month reflects your determination, it is still insufficient to meet my standards. I must decline this proposal and continue seeking a more advantageous rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I acknowledge your position, Mr. Schmidt. However reluctant I am to discontinue negotiations, my goal is to reach an acceptable agreement within my capabilities. In light of this situation, I must terminate the negotiation with this reason - unable to meet your desired rental price.

TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
